channel.title: Beta Testing
channel.description:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mz3yamvz0zn
Fight caves & pits 100% Full pvp 100% Quests 78% Real RFD chest 100%, with quest? 0% Real Kalphite Queen 100% Real Dagannoth Lair 100% Full barrows 100% All 317 specs 97% Full Mage Arena 100% Perfect PvN && NvP 99% (Thanks killamess) Pest Control 0% Redoing Perfect Projectiles 100% Giant mole 100% Castle Wars 0% Chaos Elemental 100% King black dragon 100%
Quests:
The Grand Tree - 100% -Ability to use gnome gliders + spirit trees to travel around -One of the quests to start Monkey Madness
Vampire Slayer - 100% -Nothing.
Druidic Ritual - 100% -Access to the skill herblore. -One of the quests to start Recruitment Drive
Black Knights' Fortress - 100% -One of the quests to start Recruitment Drive
Rune Mysteries - 100% -Access to the skill runecrafting -Access to both the essence mine + the abyss
Recruitment Drive - 100% -Able to change respawn points -Ability to wear initiate -Access to the initiate shop
Death Plateau - 100% -Ability to use Climbing boots -One of the quests to start Desert Treasure
Roving Elves - 100% -Ability to use crystal equipment.
Monkey Madness - 100% -Ability to use Dragon Scimmy -Access to ape atoll -Gree Gree's -One of the quests to start Recipe of Disaster
Lost City - 100% -Ability to use Dragon long + dagger -Access to Zanaris
Horror from the deep - 100% -Ability to equipt god booklets -Access to the dagannoth caves below the tower -One of the quests to start Recipe of Disaster
Desert Treasure - 5% -Ability to switch to and from ancient magicks
Fremennik Trials - 100% -Ability to wear fremennik armour -Access to Waterbirth Island
Recipe for Disaster - 0% -Ability to the culinaromancer's chest
Goblin Diplomacy - 0% -One of the quests to start Recipe of Disaster
Fight Caves Fight caves will be just like runescape, only shorter. Don't you think it is just ridiculous having to spend so much time having to just sit down and do that minigames in order just to receive one cape? That is why the Fight cave waves have been shortened to a number of 21 instead. We have also made a miniIcon to show what wave you are on! Also, because the waves have been shortened, the tokkul amount will be less in effect, minimising it down to 2678
Fight Pits One of the most famous PvP minigames has been perfected in 317 Reborn. Opponents in the pits waiting room will be added to as fighters once the timer has finished, and there people will fight. Like runescape, every fighter in the fight's combat level will be added to the amount of tokkul the winner will get at the end. No one can cheat and get free tokkul like in delta servers. You will need 2 or more people in order for the timer to start.
Mage Arena One of the most risky minigames has now been fully added to 317 Reborn. This minigame will unlock the ability to receive one of 3 god staffs + capes and unlock the 3 god spells. After defeating Kolodion and the forms of him, and after receiving your staff, you must go into the mage arena and use the spell 100 times in order to reuse that spell in the outside of the mage arena.
More explanations will come soon!
Client Explanation I have started a new client, a renamed client. This client will contain all of the old things plus more, such as hint icons, skull loading and properly loaded head icons, plus is way smaller!
Skills Magic: 100%(with correct projectiles and timing) Fishing: 100% Slayer: 100% Farming: 0%, Redoing it. Mining: 100% Cooking: 100% Prayer: 100% Runecrafting: 100% Agility: 95% Thieving: 100% Herblore: 100% Crafting: 100% Woodcutting: 100% Firemaking: 100% Smithing: 0% Ranging (with correct projectiles and timing): 100% Fletching: 100%
As you can see this is be nothing like the old project

Fight Caves
Fight caves will be just like runescape, only shorter. Don’t you think it is just ridiculous having to spend so much time having to just sit down and do that minigames in order just to receive one cape? That is why the Fight cave waves have been shortened to a number of 21 instead. We have also made a miniIcon to show what wave you are on! Also, because the waves have been shortened, the tokkul amount will be less in effect, minimising it down to 2678

Fight Pits
One of the most famous PvP minigames has been perfected in 317 Reborn. Opponents in the pits waiting room will be added to as fighters once the timer has finished, and there people will fight. Like runescape, every fighter in the fight’s combat level will be added to the amount of tokkul the winner will get at the end. No one can cheat and get free tokkul like in delta servers. You will need 2 or more people in order for the timer to start.

Mage Arena
One of the most risky minigames has now been fully added to 317 Reborn. This minigame will unlock the ability to receive one of 3 god staffs + capes and unlock the 3 god spells. After defeating Kolodion and the forms of him, and after receiving your staff, you must go into the mage arena and use the spell 100 times in order to reuse that spell in the outside of the mage arena.

More explanations will come soon!

I have started a new client, a renamed client. This client will contain all of the old things plus more, such as hint icons, skull loading and properly loaded head icons, plus is way smaller!
